## Carry Recipe
_Back Wrap Cross Carry – Base Size – Torso Pass + 2 Cross Passes_
- Torso Pass over baby on back
- Cross Wrap in Front (or half knot for chestbelt) and over shoulders
- Spread Cross Passes over baby
- TIF
